AcceptApproveCommand.title: AcceptApproveCommand
AcceptApproveCommand.summary: If an O\\\&M engineer attempts to run a command specified in the Command Approval field on the Create Control Policy page, the administrator is notified to review the command in the Bastionhost console. The command can be run only after it is approved by the administrator.

AddDatabasesToGroup.title: AddDatabasesToGroup
AddDatabasesToGroup.summary: Adds multiple databases to a specified asset group.

AddHostsToGroup.title: AddHostsToGroup
AddHostsToGroup.summary: Adds one or more hosts to the specified host group.

AddUsersToGroup.title: AddUsersToGroup
AddUsersToGroup.summary: Add one or more users to a user group.

AttachDatabaseAccountsToUser.title: AttachDatabaseAccountsToUser
AttachDatabaseAccountsToUser.summary: Authorizes a user to manage databases and database accounts.

AttachDatabaseAccountsToUserGroup.title: AttachDatabaseAccountsToUserGroup
AttachDatabaseAccountsToUserGroup.summary: Authorizes a user group to manage databases and database accounts.

AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey.title: AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey
AttachHostAccountsToHostShareKey.summary: Associates host accounts with a shared key.

AttachHostAccountsToUser.title: AttachHostAccountsToUser
AttachHostAccountsToUser.summary: After you add a user to your bastion host, you must authorize the user to manage assets. Only authorized users can log on to the bastion host to perform O\\\&M operations on the assets.

AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup.title: AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup
AttachHostAccountsToUserGroup.summary: Authorizes a user group to manage one or more hosts and host accounts.

AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser.title: AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser
AttachHostGroupAccountsToUser.summary: Authorizes a user to manage one or more host groups and host accounts.

AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup.title: AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup
AttachHostGroupAccountsToUserGroup.summary: Authorizes a user to manage one or more host groups and host accounts.

ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups.title: ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups
ConfigInstanceSecurityGroups.summary: Configures security groups for a bastion host.

ConfigInstanceWhiteList.title: ConfigInstanceWhiteList
ConfigInstanceWhiteList.summary: Configures a whitelist of public IP addresses for a bastion host.

CreateDatabase.title: CreateDatabase
CreateDatabase.summary: Imports an ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance, ApsaraDB RDS for SQL Server instance, ApsaraDB RDS for PostgreSQL instance, PolarDB for MySQL cluster, PolarDB for PostgreSQL cluster, PolarDB for PostgreSQL (Compatible with Oracle) cluster, self-managed MySQL database, self-managed SQL Server database, self-managed PostgreSQL database, or self-managed Oracle database to a bastion host.

CreateDatabaseAccount.title: CreateDatabaseAccount
CreateDatabaseAccount.summary: After a database is created, you can create a database account for the database. After the account is created, O\\\&M engineers can use the account to log on to and perform O\\\&M operations on the database.

CreateExportConfigJob.title: CreateExportConfigJob
CreateExportConfigJob.summary: Creates a configuration backup export task. You can run only one configuration backup export task on a bastion host at a time.

CreateHost.title: CreateHost
CreateHost.summary: Bastionhost allows you to perform O\\\&M operations on hosts from different sources, such as Alibaba Cloud Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances, servers in on-premises data centers, and servers on other cloud platforms. Before you perform O\\\&M operations on hosts by using a bastion host, you must import the hosts to the bastion host. You can call this operation to import a host to a bastion host.

CreateHostAccount.title: CreateHostAccount
CreateHostAccount.summary: After you import a host to a bastion host, you must add an account of the host to the bastion host. This way, O\\\&M engineers can use the account to log on to and perform O\\\&M operations on the host by using the bastion host.

CreateHostGroup.title: CreateHostGroup
CreateHostGroup.summary: You can create asset groups based on your business requirements and add assets of the same type to an asset group. This allows you to classify assets and manage multiple assets at a time.

CreateHostShareKey.title: CreateHostShareKey
CreateHostShareKey.summary: Bastionhost provides the shared key feature. This feature allows you to manage the private key that is used to log on to a host in a bastion host. This way, you can associate the private key with multiple accounts of the host to make host account management more efficient.

CreateNetworkDomain.title: CreateNetworkDomain
CreateNetworkDomain.summary: If you want to perform O\\\&M operations on assets that reside in different networks or assets that cannot communicate with the virtual private cloud (VPC) of your bastion host in a centralized manner, we recommend that you use the network domain feature of Bastionhost. You can configure a proxy server for these assets, create a network domain for a bastion host, and then connect the network domain to the proxy server. This way, you can perform O\\\&M operations on the assets by using the bastion host.

CreateOperationTicket.title: CreateOperationTicket
CreateOperationTicket.summary: If a Bastionhost administrator turns on O\\\&M Approval on the Create Control Policy page, O\\\&M engineers can log on to assets to perform O\\\&M operations only after the administrator approves their O\\\&M applications.

CreatePolicy.title: CreatePolicy
CreatePolicy.summary: Configures a command control, command approval, protocol control, or access control policy to manage O\\\&M operations. This effectively prevents users from performing high-risk operations or accidental operations to ensure O\\\&M security.

CreateRule.title: CreateRule
CreateRule.summary: You can create authorization rules to authorize multiple users to manage assets. You can also specify a validity period for an authorization rule. This way, you can manage users and assets in a more efficient manner and limit the time periods during which users can access assets.

CreateUser.title: CreateUser
CreateUser.summary: Adds a user to a bastion host.

CreateUserGroup.title: CreateUserGroup
CreateUserGroup.summary: Creates a user group for a bastion host.

CreateUserPublicKey.title: CreateUserPublicKey
CreateUserPublicKey.summary: Creates a public key for a bastion host user and hosts the public key in the bastion host. This way, O\\\&M engineers can use the private key that corresponds to the public key to log on to the bastion host from an O\\\&M client.

DeleteUserGroup.title: DeleteUserGroup
DeleteUserGroup.summary: Deletes a user group from a bastion host.

DeleteUserPublicKey.title: DeleteUserPublicKey
DeleteUserPublicKey.summary: Deletes a public key from the specified user.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the attribute information about the specified bastion host. The information includes the ID and remarks of the bastion host.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries available regions where you can create bastion hosts.

DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUser.title: DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUser
DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUser.summary: Revokes permissions on databases and database accounts from a user.

DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUserGroup.title: DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUserGroup
DetachDatabaseAccountsFromUserGroup.summary: Revokes permissions on databases and database accounts from a user group.

DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey.title: DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey
DetachHostAccountsFromHostShareKey.summary: Disassociate host accounts from a shared key.

DetachHostAccountsFromUser.title: DetachHostAccountsFromUser
DetachHostAccountsFromUser.summary: Revokes permissions on hosts and host accounts from a user.

DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup.title: DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup
DetachHostAccountsFromUserGroup.summary: Revokes the permissions on one or more hosts and host accounts from a user group.

DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser.title: DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser
DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUser.summary: Removes host groups and host accounts from the list of host groups and host accounts that a user is authorized to manage.

DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup.title: DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup
DetachHostGroupAccountsFromUserGroup.summary: Revokes permissions on one or more host groups and host accounts from a user group.

DisableInstancePublicAccess.title: DisableInstancePublicAccess
DisableInstancePublicAccess.summary: Disables Internet access to a bastion host.

EnableInstancePublicAccess.title: EnableInstancePublicAccess
EnableInstancePublicAccess.summary: Enables Internet access to a bastion host.

GetDatabase.title: GetDatabase
GetDatabase.summary: Queries the detailed information about a database.

GetDatabaseAccount.title: GetDatabaseAccount
GetDatabaseAccount.summary: Queries the detailed information about a database account.

GetHost.title: GetHost
GetHost.summary: Queries the details of a host, such as the name, source, address, protocol, and service port of the host.

GetHostAccount.title: GetHostAccount
GetHostAccount.summary: Queries the details of a specified host account.

GetHostGroup.title: GetHostGroup
GetHostGroup.summary: Queries the details of a specified host group.

GetHostShareKey.title: GetHostShareKey
GetHostShareKey.summary: Queries the information about a shared key.

GetInstanceADAuthServer.title: GetInstanceADAuthServer
GetInstanceADAuthServer.summary: Queries the settings of Active Directory (AD) authentication on a bastion host.

GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer.title: GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer
GetInstanceLDAPAuthServer.summary: Queries the settings of Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) authentication on a bastion host.

GetInstanceStoreInfo.title: GetInstanceStoreInfo
GetInstanceStoreInfo.summary: Queries the storage usage of a bastion host.

GetInstanceTwoFactor.title: GetInstanceTwoFactor
GetInstanceTwoFactor.summary: Queries the settings of two-factor authentication on a bastion host.

GetNetworkDomain.title: GetNetworkDomain
GetNetworkDomain.summary: Queries the detailed information about a network domain.

GetPolicy.title: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.summary: Queries the detailed information about a control policy.

GetPolicyAssetScope.title: GetPolicyAssetScope
GetPolicyAssetScope.summary: Queries the assets to which a control policy applies.

GetPolicyUserScope.title: GetPolicyUserScope
GetPolicyUserScope.summary: Queries the scope of users to whom a control policy applies.

GetRule.title: GetRule
GetRule.summary: Queries the detailed information about an authorization rule.

GetUser.title: GetUser
GetUser.summary: Queries the details of a user of the specified bastion host.

GetUserGroup.title: GetUserGroup
GetUserGroup.summary: Queries the details of a user group in a bastion host.

ListDatabaseAccounts.title: ListDatabaseAccounts
ListDatabaseAccounts.summary: Queries the database accounts of a database.

ListDatabaseAccountsForUser.title: ListDatabaseAccountsForUser
ListDatabaseAccountsForUser.summary: Queries the database accounts of a database and whether a user is authorized to manage each database account.

ListDatabaseAccountsForUserGroup.title: ListDatabaseAccountsForUserGroup
ListDatabaseAccountsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the database accounts of a database and whether a user group is authorized to manage each database account.

ListDatabases.title: ListDatabases
ListDatabases.summary: Queries the databases that are managed by a bastion host.

ListDatabasesForUser.title: ListDatabasesForUser
ListDatabasesForUser.summary: Queries the databases that a user is authorized to manage.

ListDatabasesForUserGroup.title: ListDatabasesForUserGroup
ListDatabasesForUserGroup.summary: Queries the databases that a user group is authorized to manage.

ListHostAccounts.title: ListHostAccounts
ListHostAccounts.summary: Queries a list of host accounts.

ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey.title: ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey
ListHostAccountsForHostShareKey.summary: Queries the host accounts that are associated with a shared key.

ListHostAccountsForUser.title: ListHostAccountsForUser
ListHostAccountsForUser.summary: Queries the host accounts of a host and whether a user is authorized to manage each host account.

ListHostAccountsForUserGroup.title: ListHostAccountsForUserGroup
ListHostAccountsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the host accounts of a host and whether a user group is authorized to manage each host account.

ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser.title: ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser
ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUser.summary: Queries the names of the host accounts that a specified user is authorized to manage in a specified host group.

ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup.title: ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup
ListHostGroupAccountNamesForUserGroup.summary: Queries the names of the host accounts that a user group is authorized to manage in a host group.

ListHostGroups.title: ListHostGroups
ListHostGroups.summary: Queries a list of asset groups that are managed by a bastion host.

ListHostGroupsForUser.title: ListHostGroupsForUser
ListHostGroupsForUser.summary: Queries a list of host groups that a bastion host user is authorized or is not authorized to manage.

ListHostGroupsForUserGroup.title: ListHostGroupsForUserGroup
ListHostGroupsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the hosts that a specified user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListHostShareKeys.title: ListHostShareKeys
ListHostShareKeys.summary: Queries the shared keys that are associated with a host.

ListHosts.title: ListHosts
ListHosts.summary: Queries the hosts in a bastion host.

ListHostsForUser.title: ListHostsForUser
ListHostsForUser.summary: Queries the hosts that a user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListHostsForUserGroup.title: ListHostsForUserGroup
ListHostsForUserGroup.summary: Queries the hosts that a user group is authorized or not authorized to manage.

ListNetworkDomains.title: ListNetworkDomains
ListNetworkDomains.summary: Queries the network domains created in a bastion host.

ListOperationDatabaseAccounts.title: ListOperationDatabaseAccounts
ListOperationDatabaseAccounts.summary: Queries a list of database accounts that the current Resource Access Management (RAM) user is authorized to manage.

ListOperationDatabases.title: ListOperationDatabases
ListOperationDatabases.summary: Queries a list of databases that the current Resource Access Management (RAM) user is authorized to manage.

ListOperationHostAccounts.title: ListOperationHostAccounts
ListOperationHostAccounts.summary: Queries a list of host accounts that the current Resource Access Management (RAM) user is authorized to manage.

ListOperationHosts.title: ListOperationHosts
ListOperationHosts.summary: Queries a list of hosts that the current Resource Access Management (RAM) user is authorized to manage.

ListOperationTickets.title: ListOperationTickets
ListOperationTickets.summary: Queries O\\\\\\&M applications to be reviewed.

ListPolicies.title: ListPolicies
ListPolicies.summary: Queries a list of control policies.

ListRules.title: ListRules
ListRules.summary: Queries a list of authorization rules of a bastion host.

ListTagKeys.title: ListTagKeys
ListTagKeys.summary: Queries the tags that are added to a resource.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added for one or more bastion hosts.

ListUserGroups.title: ListUserGroups
ListUserGroups.summary: Queries a list of user groups on a bastion host.

ListUserPublicKeys.summary: Queries all public keys of the specified user.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Queries a list of users of a bastion host.

LockUsers.title: LockUsers
LockUsers.summary: Locks one or more users of a bastion host.

ModifyDatabase.title: ModifyDatabase
ModifyDatabase.summary: Modifies the basic information about a database.

ModifyDatabaseAccount.title: ModifyDatabaseAccount
ModifyDatabaseAccount.summary: Modifies the basic information about a database account.

ModifyHost.title: ModifyHost
ModifyHost.summary: Modifies information about a host. The information includes the address, name, and description of the host and the operating system that the host runs.

ModifyHostAccount.title: ModifyHostAccount
ModifyHostAccount.summary: Modifies the information about a host account, such as the username, password, and private key of the host account.

ModifyHostGroup.title: ModifyHostGroup
ModifyHostGroup.summary: Modifies the name or description of the specified host group.

ModifyHostsActiveAddressType.title: ModifyHostsActiveAddressType
ModifyHostsActiveAddressType.summary: Changes the endpoint type of one or more hosts for O\\\&M. Public and private IP addresses are supported.

ModifyHostsPort.title: ModifyHostsPort
ModifyHostsPort.summary: Changes the port for the O\\\\\\&M protocol on one or more hosts.

ModifyInstanceADAuthServer.title: ModifyInstanceADAuthServer
ModifyInstanceADAuthServer.summary: Modifies the settings of the Active Directory (AD) authentication server of a bastion host.

ModifyInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAttribute
ModifyInstanceAttribute.summary: Modifies the information about a bastion host.

ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer.title: ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer
ModifyInstanceLDAPAuthServer.summary: Modifies the settings of the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) authentication server of a bastion host.

ModifyInstanceTwoFactor.title: ModifyInstanceTwoFactor
ModifyInstanceTwoFactor.summary: Modifies the two-factor authentication settings of a bastion host.

ModifyNetworkDomain.title: ModifyNetworkDomain
ModifyNetworkDomain.summary: Modifies the basic information about a network domain.

ModifyPolicy.title: ModifyPolicy
ModifyPolicy.summary: Modifies the basic information about a control policy.

ModifyRule.title: ModifyRule
ModifyRule.summary: Modifies the basic information of an authorization rule.

ModifyUser.title: ModifyUser
ModifyUser.summary: Modifies the information about a user of a bastion host.

ModifyUserGroup.title: ModifyUserGroup
ModifyUserGroup.summary: Modifies the information about a user group.

ModifyUserPublicKey.title: ModifyUserPublicKey
ModifyUserPublicKey.summary: Modifies the public key of the user.

MoveDatabasesToNetworkDomain.title: MoveDatabasesToNetworkDomain
MoveDatabasesToNetworkDomain.summary: Adds multiple databases to a network domain at a time.

MoveHostsToNetworkDomain.title: MoveHostsToNetworkDomain
MoveHostsToNetworkDomain.summary: Adds multiple hosts to a network domain at a time.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a bastion host from one resource group to another resource group.

RejectApproveCommand.title: RejectApproveCommand
RejectApproveCommand.summary: If an O\\\&M engineer attempts to run a command specified in the Command Approval section of the Create Control Policy page, the administrator is notified to review the command in the Bastionhost console. The command can be run only after it is approved by the administrator.

RejectOperationTicket.title: RejectOperationTicket
RejectOperationTicket.summary: If a Bastionhost administrator enables O\\\&M Approval on the Create Control Policy page, O\\\&M engineers can log on to assets to perform O\\\&M operations only after the administrator approves their O\\\&M applications.

RemoveDatabasesFromGroup.title: RemoveDatabasesFromGroup
RemoveDatabasesFromGroup.summary: Removes multiple databases from an asset group at a time.

RemoveHostsFromGroup.title: RemoveHostsFromGroup
RemoveHostsFromGroup.summary: Removes multiple hosts from an asset group at a time.

RemoveUsersFromGroup.title: RemoveUsersFromGroup
RemoveUsersFromGroup.summary: Removes one or more users from a user group.

RenewAssetOperationToken.title: RenewAssetOperationToken
RenewAssetOperationToken.summary: Renews an O\\\&M token for one hour.

ResetHostAccountCredential.title: ResetHostAccountCredential
ResetHostAccountCredential.summary: Deletes the logon credential of a specified host account. The logon credential can be the password or Secure Shell (SSH) private key.

SetPolicyAccessTimeRangeConfig.title: SetPolicyAccessTimeRangeConfig
SetPolicyAccessTimeRangeConfig.summary: Configures the logon period limits in a control policy.

SetPolicyApprovalConfig.title: SetPolicyApprovalConfig
SetPolicyApprovalConfig.summary: Configures the O\&M approval setting in a control policy.

SetPolicyAssetScope.title: SetPolicyAssetScope
SetPolicyAssetScope.summary: Specifies the assets to which a control policy applies.

SetPolicyCommandConfig.title: SetPolicyCommandConfig
SetPolicyCommandConfig.summary: Specifies the commands that can or cannot be run by the users or on the assets associated with the policy and the commands that must be reviewed.

SetPolicyIPAclConfig.title: SetPolicyIPAclConfig
SetPolicyIPAclConfig.summary: Specifies whether a source IP address can access the assets to which a control policy applies.

SetPolicyProtocolConfig.title: SetPolicyProtocolConfig
SetPolicyProtocolConfig.summary: Configures the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) options, SSH options, and SSH Fine Transfer Protocol (SFTP) options for a control policy.

SetPolicyUserScope.title: SetPolicyUserScope
SetPolicyUserScope.summary: Specifies the users to whom a control policy applies.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates and adds tags to specified bastion hosts.

UnlockUsers.title: UnlockUsers
UnlockUsers.summary: Unlocks one or more users of a bastion host.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from the specified bastion host and deletes the tags at a time.
